question: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life?

steps.content: How can I apply minimalism to my digital life?
Plan: 1) Search for strategies to apply minimalism to digital life. 2) Return a concise and practical answer.
Searching for ways to apply minimalism to digital life.
Found strategies: declutter devices by deleting unused apps, organize files into essential folders, unsubscribe from unnecessary emails, set screen time limits.

To apply minimalism to your digital life, you can declutter your digital devices by deleting unused apps, organizing files into essential folders, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, and setting screen time limits to focus on meaningful activities.

true_answer: To apply minimalism to your digital life, you can declutter your digital devices by deleting unused apps, organizing files into essential folders, unsubscribing from unnecessary emails, and setting screen time limits to focus on meaningful activities.
